help-file.title: "GOD, CHEATING"
help-file.content:
This is a sensitive issue on any MUD. Cheating degrades the environment and can do considerable damage to a MUD's reputation when it occurs.
Thus, on Duris, we have developed a very strict policy toward cheating, and you MUST understand it. This policy is simple and to the point:
If you are caught cheating with your god, you will be deleted from the MUD. You will lose all of your god powers and there will be no questions asked and no second chances.
There are no exceptions. This rulings stands for Forgers as well as all other gods. Cheating is NOT tolerated here. We have adopted this strict policy in order to discourage people from cheating in the first place. Just don't do it, it's not worth the consequences if you are caught.
And, as a reminder, Duris has VERY detailed logs. Almost everything you d as a god is logged: loading objects, dropping things, moving about, almost everything.
We are not trying to be policemen here, nor Big Brother. Always watching over your shoulder waiting for you to make the wrong move. Trust is a major factor that affects all of us gods, and without it, we would never gain any major accomplishments. The Forgers almost never look at the logs, but they do, occasionally, when they are bored or receive a complaint. Don't be nervous about having your actions recorded; just don't cheat. If, by chance, someone witnesses you cheating (as is most often the case), you are history, period.
If you have even the remotest doubt as to whether your actions would constitute cheating, DON'T DO IT. Put the situation on hold and consult with a higher level god.
Thus, the policy is set. You have read it and are expected to abide by it.
